coupon.title: 4-Wheel Alignment Special

descriptions.description: Poorly aligned wheels wear out tires prematurely and reduce gas mileage. Service includes:

services.service: Inspect/adjust caster, camber and toe-in as applicable
Check tire pressure, adjust as necessary

coupon.disclaimer: Plus applicable taxes. Valid only at RAMSEY MAZDA. Cannot be used with any other applicable offer. Mazda vehicles only. Prices may vary by model. Hazardous waste fee if applicable. Please present coupon at time of write-up. Coupon expires 06/30/2017.

coupon.title: Mazda Battery Special

descriptions.description: Your Genuine Mazda battery is a key component to your vehicle's overall reliability and performance. For peace of mind, come in today and have one of our technicians install a new Genuine Mazda battery. Don't wait until it's too late.

coupon.disclaimer: Plus applicable taxes. Valid only at RAMSEY MAZDA. Cannot be used with any other applicable offer. Mazda vehicles only. Prices may vary by model. Hazardous waste fee if applicable. Please present coupon at time of write-up. Coupon expires 06/30/2017.

coupon.title: Enhance Air Quality with a New Cabin Air Filter

descriptions.description: The air you breathe is only as clean as the filter it goes through. A new cabin air filter will reduce impurities such as pollen, dust, mold and other airborne containments. Recommended every 12 - 24 months.

coupon.disclaimer: Plus applicable taxes. Valid only at RAMSEY MAZDA. Cannot be used with any other applicable offer. Mazda vehicles only. Prices may vary by model. Hazardous waste fee if applicable. Please present coupon at time of write-up. Coupon expires 06/30/2017.

coupon.title: Mazda Service Special

descriptions.description:
Replace engine oil and Genuine Mazda oil filter
Rotate and inspect tires, check brake wear
Check engine coolant
Check cooling system for leaks
Check and top off all fluid levels
Check belts and hoses
Check and adjust tire pressure
Check exhaust system
Check constant velocity(CV) boots
Complete a multi-point inspection
*Synthetic oil extra/Up to 5 quarts
